# dutch (nl)
# phoneme example [homophone] [homophone]...

# sources:
# https://nl.wiktionary.org/wiki/wikiwoordenboek:standaardweergave_uitspraak_nederlands
# https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/dutch_phonology

# normal vowels
a h[aa]r
ɑ k[a]n ɑ̃
e m[ee]r
ɛ p[e]t æ
i b[i]et i̯
ɪ k[i]p ɪ̯ ɪː
o [oo]g o̝
ɔ [o]s ʌ ʊ̯
y [uu]r y̯
ʏ [u]k ʏ̯
ø [eu]ro ɵ
u [oe]ver u̯
ə g[e]makkelijk

# elongated vowels
aː j[a]
ɑː f[a]rm
eː v[ee]r
ɛː [oe]ver
iː anal[y]se
ɔː r[o]ze oː øː
yː centrif[u]ge
uː c[oo]l
œː man[oeu]vre œ
ʏː res[ea]rch
oː b[oo]t

# dipthongs
ɛi [ij]s
ɑu [au]gurk
œy [ui]l ʌʊ

# plosives (stops)
p [p]as
b [b]ij
t [t]ien
d [d]en
c [tj]alk
ʔ na[-]apen
k [k]at
ɡ [g]oal g

# fricatives
f [f]oto
v [v]ier
s [s]ok
z [z]es
x [ch]emie
ɣ [g]at χ
h [h]eer ɦ
ʃ [sj]aal
ʒ [j]am

# other consonants
m [m]an
n [n]ul ɲ
ŋ to[ng]
ɱ i[n]fuus
l [l]ip ɫ
ɹ [r]ol r
j [j]as ʲ
w [w]iel ʋ β w̞ β̞
